title: Bandwidth: T-Mobile parent company kills its cloud gaming service you likely didnâ€™t know existed
content:
More and more cloud gaming services have launched over the past few years, to the point where some are hard to keep track of. This week, T-Mobile’s parent company Deutsche Telekom announced that it would shut down “Magenta Gaming,” a cloud gaming service that certainly went under the radar for most.

more…

The post Bandwidth: T-Mobile parent company kills its cloud gaming service you likely didn’t know existed appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Pulling the rug out from players, T-Mobile's parent company is shutting down the Magenta Gaming cloud service that launched in 2020.
